beetle_kit

Class GridCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • beetle_kit.GridCell

  • public class GridCell
extends java.lang.Object
    Chemistry Passport Project This represents the information contained in a cell in the grid for the Estimation Game.
    Version:
    April 30, 2015
    Author:
    Charlotte Dye, Humaira Orchee, and Sehr Sethi
